item.title: WordPress Plugin Archive - DBC Backup 2
item.description: DBC Backup 2 was a WordPress plugin to safely back-up your database.

item.title: DBC Backup 2 - minor update
item.description: DBC Backup 2 my WordPress plugin to safely backup your website has had a minor update.

item.title: DBC Backup 2 new version is ready for you
item.description: DBC Backup 2 is a WordPress plugin that creates backups of your database.

item.title: DBC Backup 2 - v2.3 what's coming
item.description: The next version of DBC Backup 2 is just around the corner - I've held it back to better test the backup files and tinker with the admin panel.

item.title: DBC Backup 2 - new version on the way updated for MySQL 5.6 and latest WordPress
item.description: DBC Backup 2 my WordPress plugin to safely back-up your database is getting an massive update.

item.title: DBC Backup 2 updated for WordPress 3.6
item.description: A new version of DBC Backup 2 my WordPress plugin to automatically backup your website has been released.

item.title: Open Letter to Users of DBC Backup (the old plugin)
item.description: So I noticed recently that Google has an index of everyone who has installed my plugin but hasn't locked down their website.

item.title: DBC Backup 2 updated to 2.1.1 it's a little bit harder Update Now
item.description: A new version of DBC Backup 2 has been released. I'm doing this to make life just a little bit harder.

item.title: Thank you 2000+ downloads of DBC Backup 2 for WordPress
item.description: I want to say ‘Thank You’ to all of you who have downloaded and installed DBC Backup 2.

item.title: DBC Backup 2 - gives the confidence that your WordPress database is backed-up and securely stored on your server [press release]
item.description: DBC Backup 2 gives confidence that your WordPress database is safely stored.

item.title: DBC Backup 2 - WordPress database backup - Here comes version 2.1
item.description: DBC Backup 2 for WordPress database backup has just been updated.

item.title: DBC Backup 2 - sneak peak of the new version
item.description: I wanted to give you a sneak peak at DBC Backup 2 and changes which are coming in the next version.

item.title: WordPress database backup plugin launched - DBC Backup 2
item.description: Announcing DBC Backup 2, a WordPress plugin to backup your WordPress SQL database is now available from WordPress Plugins.
